short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension provides Import/Export between SS sites and some useful stuff

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This tool helps to do import and export between Squarespace sites (7.0 & 7.1) and enables some additional tweaks like Content and Tweaks Presets you may use and share with others. Speed up your Squarespace workflow!
